existing_features.title: Update the /solutions landing page content so that it contains 6 scrollable, clearly separated sections (one per solution category), and each category section renders a list/grid of its respective solution services as links.

Implement scroll-sync behavior so that when a user scrolls within /solutions and a specific solution category section becomes active (in viewport), the SiteHeader 'Our Solutions' dropdown updates to show/highlight the respective solutions for that active category.

new_feature_requests.summary: Sync the 'Our Solutions' dropdown so that as the user scrolls to a specific solution category section, the dropdown shows/highlights the respective solutions for that category

projectName: Sync 'Our Solutions' dropdown with active solution category while scrolling
